text: Bangi mu bantu abaaweebwa ekitabo baagala babakyuse oluvanyuma lwo bukkiriza bwa mmwe babafuule abatakkiriza olw'ensaalwa eri mu mitima gyabwe oluvanyuma lw'amazima okubeeyoleka. Kale (mmwe abasiraamu) musonyiwe era mulekere (abo abaaweebwa ekitabo) okutuusa Katonda lw'anaaleeta ekiragiro kye, mazima Katonda muyinza ku buli kintu
